title: The MMA Road Show with John Morgan, No. 236.5 – Melbourne: UFC 234 wrap-up, featuring Israel Adesanya
text:
By: John Morgan and Ken Hathaway | October 6, 2019 6:45 am

Episode No. 236.5 of “The MMA Road Show with John Morgan” podcast is now available for streaming and download.

MMA Junkie lead staff reporter John Morgan hosts the show while traveling the world to cover the sport.

John Morgan and Cold Coffee are in Australia for UFC 234, and they sit down to wrap up an entertaining card, including a very special performance from Israel Adesanya.

Check it out on iTunes or at themmaroadshow.com. You can also subscribe via RSS.
description: Episode No. 236.5 of “The MMA Road Show with John Morgan” podcast is now available for streaming and download.
